mapper.sql: id, organ_no, organ_code, name, parent_no, status, organ_level, order_no, path, zone_no, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM organ WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO organ (id, organ_no, organ_code, name, parent_no, status, organ_level, order_no, path, zone_no, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark ) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{organNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{organCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{organLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zoneNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO organ
id,
organ_no,
organ_code,
name,
parent_no,
status,
organ_level,
order_no,
path,
zone_no,
create_user,
create_time,
update_user,
update_time,
remark,

#{organCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
UPDATE organ
organ_no = #{organNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
organ_code = #{organCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_no = #{parentNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
organ_level = #{organLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zone_no = #{zoneNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE organ SET organ_no = #{organNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, organ_code = #{organCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_no = #{parentNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, organ_level = #{organLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zone_no = #{zoneNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.organ_no, t.organ_code, t.name, t.parent_no, t.status, t.organ_level, t.order_no, t.path, t.zone_no, t.create_user, t.create_time, t.update_user, t.update_time, t.remark FROM organ t INNER JOIN ( SELECT tt.organ_no FROM order_unit tt INNER JOIN shop_brand t1 ON tt.order_unit_no = t1.order_unit_no AND t1.shop_no = #{params.shopNo} ) t2 ON t.organ_no = t2.organ_no AND t.organ_level = '1'
